        public java.util.List<E> getAllSortedBy​(java.util.function.Function<E,​java.lang.String> stringFieldExtractor)
        Returns a list sorted by the given function. The list will be sorted by Java, so this is an expensive operation for big lists.

      • getId

public I getId​(E e)
        Determines the primary key of the given entity by using reflection.
        Parameters:
        e - entity
        Returns:
        primary key of the given entity

      • reattach

        public E reattach​(E e)
        Tries to find a managed entity corresponding to the given (possibly detached) entity. If the entity is already managed, it will be returned immediately without Db lookup, so it is safe to call this function. Please be aware that any modifications to the given entity will not be reflected by the returned entity, if it has to be re-loaded from the persistence context! If the entity is not persisted nor has a valid key, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        e - entity
        Returns:
        managed entity

      • refresh

        public E refresh​(E e)
        Reloads an entity from the database, and reattaches it if needed.
        Parameters:
        e - entity
        Returns:
        refreshed entity
